Uses of Interface
chav1961.purelib.i18n.interfaces.Localizer

Packages that use Localizer 
Package Description
chav1961.purelib.basic
This package contains a set of classes for the basic abilities of the library.
chav1961.purelib.i18n
This package contains description of Pure Library internationalization classes.
chav1961.purelib.i18n.interfaces
This package contains description of locale-specific interfaces and annotations.
chav1961.purelib.ui
This package contains a set of classes to use in the UI-oriented applications.
chav1961.purelib.ui.interfaces
This package contains a set of interfaces and enumerations to use in the UI-oriented applications.
chav1961.purelib.ui.swing  
chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.useful
This package contains a set of useful classes to use in the Swing applications.

  • Uses of Localizer in chav1961.purelib.i18n

    Classes in chav1961.purelib.i18n that implement Localizer 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AbstractLocalizer
    This is an abstract class to implements any localizers.
    class  DebuggingLocalizer
    This class is a special implementation to use in the JUnit tests only.
    class  DummyLocalizer
    This class is a special implementation of localizer to use in non-multilanguaged applications.
    class  FileSystemLocalizer
    This class is a file-system-based implementation of the Localizer.
    class  MutableJsonLocalizer
    This class is a mutable collection of key/value pairs for different languages.
    class  PropertiesLocalizer
    Deprecated. 
    class  PureLibLocalizer
    This class is an own localizer for the Pure Library components.
    class  XMLLocalizer
    This class is a wrapper to standard Java ResourceBundle class.
